listing.listing_description: _ Please note that there is an ongoing construction project near this villa. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. _Stay amid the icons of London in your own private pied-à-terre at Mayfair One. Tucked behind the famed Claridge’s hotel and restaurant, this jewel-like vacation rental is an oasis within easy reach of everything from shops and eateries to palaces and museums. This one-bedroom luxury property is just the right size for a couple wanting a getaway or a honeymoon in the heart of the city.Mayfair One has all the comforts of home: a TV to entertain you after a day of sightseeing, heating and air conditioning for whatever the London weather does, laundry facilities to make it easy to get ready for another day out or a special evening, and Wi-Fi to keep you in touch with friends and family at home.Taking its inspiration from both mid-century and modern style, the apartment is a study in understated glamour. The neutral tones of its open-concept living and dining room are set off by accents in jewel-toned fabrics and metallic artwork, as well as a geometric-patterned area rug. The separate kitchen is fully equipped and features stylishly high-contrast white cabinets against dark countertops.The bedroom at Mayfair One has a king bed, TV and en-suite bathroom. Its chic silver-toned carpet matches the floor-length drapes, and a tufted headboard echoes the built-in storage. In the bathroom, polished stone tile lends spa-worthy appeal.As this is the middle of London, there’s something nearby to make everyone’s holiday. The villa is surrounded by shops where you’ll find everything from vintage to couture and restaurants where you can have a quick coffee or a dinner to remember. It’s less than a 15-minute walk to Hyde Park and Piccadilly Circus, and less than a 20-minute drive to Trafalgar Square, Kensington Palace and Buckingham Palace, plus Westminster Abbey and Big Ben.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Stay in a brand-new building in a neighborhood with character at Goodge Street. This modern vacation rental is in the heart of Fitzrovia, a central area of London that was once known for its boho past and today is a lively mix of cafés, offices and residential streets. Make this two-bedroom apartment your home for a getaway with friends, a holiday with family or a honeymoon in one of the world’s great cities.The villa’s state-of-the-art amenities range from a TV, DVD player, sound system and Wi-Fi to an espresso machine, heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities. In warmer weather, relax with a glass of wine on the apartment’s spacious private terrace; when it’s cold outside, cozy up indoors by the fireplace.A fold-away glass wall links the terrace with the open-concept living and dining room, flooding the interiors with sunlight and allowing you to create one large space during the summer. A sleek wall of built-in cabinets conceals the TV and fireplace, while pieces like brass-toned accent tables add a touch of glam. The galley kitchen is just through a doorway beyond the dining table and is fully equipped.Each of the two bedrooms at Goodge Street has a double bed; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other has access to a shared bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are spacious and bright, and one even offers terrace access.From this luxury property’s location near the intersection of Goodge Street and Tottenham Court Road, it’s a 15-minute drive or less to attractions such as St. Paul’s Cathedral, Hyde Park, Kensington Palace, Trafalgar Square and Covent Garden. For shopping, dining and nightlife, you’ll find everything from chic bistros to old-fashioned pubs close at hand in Fitzrovia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Bungalow is a stylish one-bedroom suite in the heart of Park City, located right on Historic Main Street, within a short walk of Town Lift. Ideal for couples or small families, the apartment blends the vintage alpine charm and contemporary sophistication of this Rocky Mountain capital, providing an ideal home base for ski vacations, summer golf getaways, or pilgrimages to the Sundance Film Festival.After a day on the mountain or an evening on the town, the open-plan living area provides lovely setting for sharing downtime with loved-ones. The designer kitchen is fully equipped with Viking and Subzero appliances and includes a breakfast bar for four, while the lounge area features sumptuous furnishings, a Sonos Sound System, and a large, mounted Apple TV. The décor features rustic wood paneling, floors, and ceiling beams and exquisite modernist touches in the light fixtures and hearth. Heating, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer ensure comfort and convenience for all guests.The Bungalow's bedroom features a king bed, walk-in closet, TV, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. There is also a queen-size sofa bed in the living room. The rich wood paneling evokes an idyllic alpine cabin, while comfortable bedding and high-end bathroom fixtures inspire refreshing repose before your next adventure.An elevator leads to the building's lobby, from which the many splendors of Park City unfurl before you. Park Silly Sunday Market is right next door, and Town Lift Plaza is a short walk down Main Street. Skiers can also take a five-minute drive by car or shuttle to the Park City or Deer Valley bases, while golfers are just ten minutes from Park City Golf Course. Public parking is available under the Marriot Hotel (guests are reimbursed for parking costs), and the Park City Transit center is steps away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This fabulous mountain chalet is situated within Moonlight Basin at Big Sky Resort, about fifty feet from Natawista Run. Part of the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa offers an exquisite balance of high-end contemporary design and rustic Montana comforts. Ample outdoor living areas include an open-air hot tub, while the superbly appointed interiors feature comfortable living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, and top-of-the-line media features. Three spacious and cozy bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunkroom accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size. At extra cost, guests enjoy access to the wonderful amenities at Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including its Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course.The living room features high ceilings and large windows framing beautiful views of the mountains and forest. A lovely sofa faces the gas fireplace and flat-screen TV, while a glass doors opens to the summer lounge on the deck. The open kitchen features chef-grade appliances and serves a four-person bar and charming dining booth with banquette seating for six. Luminous white walls complement the rich wood accents, designer light features, superb contemporary artwork, and exquisite mountain light.The bedrooms offer generous private havens for downtime and rest. The master suite opens to a balcony and features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Two queen guestrooms share a bathroom with dual vanity and shower, while the kids' room has two bunk beds (sleeping four) and access to a hallway bathroom with shower. Air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.Natawista Run is just steps away, while the resort's base and town center are easily reachable by car. Walk about a minute to Moonlight Basin Cabin, featuring superb dining, a private outdoor pool, a fitness center, and a championship golf course. The chalet is also within easy reach of Big Sky Golf Course and Spanish Peaks Clubhouse, among numerous other attractions. The West Entrance of Yellowstone is about sixty miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With unbeatable views of the crystal-clear ocean and sophisticated European-style furnishings, Villa Sublime truly lives up to its name. Located on the south coast of Providenciales near Silly Creek, the property has three bedrooms, with the option of a fourth, and plenty of space for up to six guests to spread out. Sunbathe around the pool or slip into the ocean via the villa’s unique grotto.Not only is Villa Sublime itself quite spacious, but its 1.5 acres of land afford stunning views of Silly Creek and sunsets over Turtle Rock. Start each day with breakfast at the covered outdoor dining area, then soak in the sunshine from the pool terrace or take the path down to the ocean for a swim. Inside, the villa has central air conditioning and other perks.Villa Sublime’s living spaces mix traditional Caribbean pieces with European touches for one-of-a-kind style. In the living room, white walls, slipcovered sofas and wicker armchairs feel cool and tropical, while a Persian-style rug, antique armoire, columns and wrought-iron accents add a sense of history. The dining room, which is open to the kitchen, has an elegant wrought-iron and glass table plus an ocean view, and the kitchen itself has fresh-feeling white cabinets and stone countertops.Each of the property’s three bedrooms has air conditioning, a ceiling fan, a television and a DVD player. There is one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one bedroom with a queen bedroom and en-suite bathroom and one bedroom with a queen bed and adjacent bathroom. Larger parties can use the den, which has two twin sleeper sofas, as a fourth bedroom.Swimming in the turquoise Turks and Caicos waters is at your doorstep at Villa Sublime, but the beach is just a short drive away, too. It’s also 15 minutes by car to downtown Providenciales and its shopping, restaurants and resorts, as well as the international airport.Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out gondola access pairs with sophisticated lodge style at Sunshine Mountain. Part of the exclusive One Steamboat Place resort, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just minutes from some of the best skiing in Colorado. The three bedrooms in this luxury private residence can accommodate up to eight guests, and the resort’s first-class amenities make for a memorable family vacation or holiday with friends.Guests of Sunshine Mountain are welcome to use the shared pools, hot tubs, fitness center and games room at One Steamboat Place. There’s also a wine cellar, tasting room and spa for grown-ups, and a children’s center for younger visitors. If you’ll be entertaining during your stay, the villa has its own deck with a barbecue and lounge furniture, as well as an inviting media room.The rich colors, natural textures and luxe finishes found throughout One Steamboat Place are in abundance inside Sunshine Mountain. Tones of apple red and chocolate brown lend a welcoming appeal to the villa’s open-plan great room, and the gas fireplace is a warm focal point for the sectional and leather armchairs. There’s seating for ten in rustic ladder-back chairs around the dining table, and even more room at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Sunshine Mountain has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms and one bedroom with two double beds and a shared bathroom. The media room has a sofa bed and en-suite bathroom, so larger parties can easily use the space as a fourth bedroom.While the nearest lift is just a minute away from the villa—and easily reached on skis—the resort also provides a seasonal shuttle service for guests. Don’t miss a visit to the area’s namesake hot springs, whether you take the kids to Steamboat Springs Old Town to play in the pools or your sweetheart to Strawberry Park for some honeymoon-worthy stargazing amid the natural rock formations. For summer visitors, the Rollingstone Ranch golf course is known for its fast greens and is less than 2 miles from the resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Slip away to the tropics in modern style at Villa Canggu North. Set in a sleepy fishing village just steps from quiet—but up-and-coming—Nelayan Beach, this luxury Bali vacation rental offers a private but convenient setting for a warm-weather getaway, complete with staff. The villa’s two bedrooms are just the right size for a small family holiday or intimate honeymoon, or you can rent the four-bedroom sister property and host a special event or destination wedding.Your stay at Villa Canggu North includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, villa manager and others; a car and driver can also be arranged at extra cost. Spend lazy days lounging on the terrace by the pool, sipping refreshments from the bar, catching up on reading in the meditation loft, having friendly competitions around the ping-pong table or trying out new dishes on the barbecue.Floor-to-ceiling glass walls open the gallery-like great room to the pool terrace. White walls and polished concrete floors are a quiet backdrop for tufted sofas, textured wood dining stools and vibrant contemporary paintings, murals and sculptures, including a whimsical ship suspended from the ceiling. Though the chef turns out meals from the main kitchen, a fully equipped kitchenette is tucked in one corner of the great room for guests’ use.Both of the bedrooms at Villa Canggu North have king beds and en-suite bathrooms; one opens to a terrace as well. As in the great room, the walls are covered in playful, brightly colored artwork, while in the bathrooms, glass walls and open vanities make the most of the views of the lush surroundings and create a spa-worthy vibe.Your Bali vacation begins with a flight into Ngurah Rai International Airport, a 13-mile drive from the villa. If you’re in search of sun, make the 1-minute walk from the house to Nelayan Beach or the short drive to Canggu Beach or Echo Beach. Browse the shops, sit down at the oceanfront restaurants or take in the show at the live music venues along the beaches, or book a surf lesson at Batu Bolong. Keep driving to play a round at Nirwana Bali Golf Club, visit the Tanah Lot Sea Temple or spend a day above the ground at Bali Treetop Adventure Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Walk past a row of swaying palm trees to reach the front door of this cubic villa. Shades of blue move throughout, in the form of plump couches, accent rugs, and abstract artwork, like the gently rolling waves of the Atlantic Ocean. Walk mere minutes to reach snorkeling adventures (think: sea turtles, lobsters, a rainbow of tropical fish) in Smith’s Reef or guided boat tours in Turtle Cove Marina.Sliding glass doors open the full length of the living room, expanding out to the secluded stretch of Babalua Beach, where you can dive in and be apart of the vivid underwater life. Set into the sugar-white sand, the heated infinity pool imitates the colour of the ocean, melting into the far-reaching vista beyond. Soaking up rays is effortless on the outdoor loungers, perhaps with a martini in hand and music in the air. Seek solace from the sun under the open air pergola, allowing yourself the comfort of the shade while inhaling the intoxicating scent of the sea. Soft ivory sand and crystal clear waters at Grace Bay Beach are 10 minutes away by car. Tee off at Provo Golf Club, explore a string of sleepy cays at Leeward, or mingle with the locals at The Bight Park’s Fish Fry. Back at the Sandcastle, your crew can enjoy happy hour or a starlit, alfresco dinner on the terrace.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: What lies beneath this 16th-century brick villa is a hidden indulgence: a private spa with a secret pool. There are more obvious charms, too: two wings overlooking the Tuscan countryside, a magazine-worthy mix of ancient architecture and up-to-the-minute furnishings, and a location in the heart of hilltop San Miniato. It’s a 5-minute walk to restaurants and shops beneath the town’s clock tower.Finish a day of sightseeing with a glass of wine, sipped on the furnished terrace overlooking the valley, or an espresso from the villa’s machine, savored while browsing via Wi-Fi. But the highlight of the villa’s amenities might be the Roman-bath-inspired spa reached by hidden staircase, where warm water and in-pool seating invite you to stay and soak a while.Floor-to-ceiling glass bathes the warm red-brick walls of this vacation rental in light for a look that’s both industrial and inviting. The design is, like much of modern Italy, cool but not cold, with a cluster of sofas in the living room, mid-century walnut dining chairs in the dining area, and a marble breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the 2 bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, ensuite bathroom, and air conditioning; one of the bedrooms also has direct access to the indoor pool area. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms pair textured brick walls with sleek glass ones, and invite you to sit on mid-century-inspired armchairs.Once part of a bustling palace, this villa is still at the heart of the action, close to restaurants where you can relive your honeymoon over a bottle of local wine and markets where you can pick up produce for a family dinner. It’s also a wonderful base for day trips during your holiday, with Florence, Lucca, and Pisa 30 minutes away, and Siena 40 minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lake, mountains and sky are on full display at Fifteen. Seen through the windows of this sleek contemporary estate, the scenery fills the open-plan living spaces, forming an unforgettable backdrop to a stay with friends or family. And if you’d like to get out and explore the panoramas up close, you’ll find that the villa’s Aspen Grove setting is only minutes from downtown Queenstown, golf and skiing.Beautifully appointed outdoor living spaces with sitting and dining areas, a barbecue, a fire pit and a heated hot tub invite you to savor the fresh air. On cooler evenings, set the mood with the indoor sound system, cozy up to the fireplace or a favorite show on TV, or share the best snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Clean lines, nearly wall-to-wall windows and an open plan give Fifteen an air of decidedly contemporary luxury. Both the living room and the fully equipped kitchen open to lake views on one side and outdoor living areas on the other, giving them a breezy, laid-back feel. But alongside the relaxed layout are classic modern pieces, from the Eames lounger by the fireplace and upholstered dining chairs to the flat-fronted kitchen cabinets.The master suite at this South Island vacation rental has a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds and share a Jack and Jill bathroom. All three, however, are well appointed with luxe linens and feature gorgeous lake and mountain views.Whether you’re in New Zealand with family, friends or on honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do around Fifteen. The villa is about a 10-minute drive or less from shopping and dining in central Queenstown, plus attractions ranging from the serene botanical gardens to the yacht club and casino. Golf is also a short drive away, as are the ski areas of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend quality time with your loved ones in this newly built two-bedroom home in the countryside of Bali’s southwest coast. With five separate pavilions sitting on 1,600 square meters of land, this getaway offers one of the best values of all our villas in Bali. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.Soak in the sun on a cushioned chaise lounge alongside the slate-lined swimming pool—you’ll have complete privacy thanks to a lush walled garden and several palm trees. If you need shade, head to the relaxation pavilion, it is stocked with two timber beds, and is the perfect spot for a massage or to get lost in a good book. Other amenities include Wi-Fi access and the use of bicycles.The open-sided living area features a plush sofa with colorful throw pillows, a vaulted ceiling with fans and views overlooking the pool and garden. Just behind, is a cozy media room/office where you can settle in with a movie in the evenings. You won’t have to worry about cooking—there’s an on-site chef who can whip up popular Asian and Western dishes in the modern kitchen, and you can enjoy your meals in the semi-open-air dining room.Up to four guests are welcome to stay in the villa’s two bedrooms, making this an ideal romantic getaway, or as a holiday spot for a small family or two couples. Both air-conditioned rooms have king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with alfresco showers, as well as terraces with daybeds.Nearby the villa is a path leading down to the river and rice fields. Meanwhile, Seseh Beach is just 300 meters away, and Echo Beach is only 9 km from the villa. Golf enthusiasts can head to the renowned greens of the Nirwana Bali Golf Course, and those seeking to do some shopping can get their fill in Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note Penthouse on Beach is staffed with an on-site property manager who will tend to your daily requests. The property manager has a desk at the main reception of the Villa where he/she may go from time to time to manage the business aspects of the property. If you prefer not to have anyone on-site during your stay for complete privacy, please inform your Villa Specialist as this can be arranged._ Perched high above the exclusive Camps Bay enclave near Cape Town, Penthouse on Beach offers spectacular views of Table Bay, the Atlantic Ocean, and the white-sand beaches below. Its three beautiful bedroom suites sleep six, and its naturally elegant décor exude peace and class, making it an ideal choice for families and groups of friends seeking privacy and privileged vistas on this gorgeous coast of South Africa.Your luxury villa features an outdoor terrace with comfortable loungers and an elevated infinite swimming pool, offering unparalleled ocean views. With a comfortable outdoor lounge and alfresco dining table as well, it's the ideal sanctuary for relishing the ocean breeze and glasses of delicious South African wine. Lovely lighting allows you to savor the fresh air well into the night.Floor-to-ceiling glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's luminous interior. Here, the stunning views are the main show, with multiple comfortable lounge areas arrayed by large windows offering expansive bird's-eye vistas of the city, mountains, and ocean. The fully equipped kitchen also features inspiring views, as well as a comfortable breakfast bar, while the dining table offers the perfect setting for memorable dinners together. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, with contemporary design themes and original artwork complemented by natural materials that root you to the beautiful land and seascapes surrounding you.The villa's views and serene natural light continue in the sumptuous bedrooms, where each has a unique vantage of your unforgettable surroundings. The Deluxe Room features a double size bed, a private balcony, clear views of Robben Island, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, while both the Table View Room and the Ocean View room include queen beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bath.From the villa's high perch, you're within easy reach of the cultural and natural riches of Cape Town and its environs. Sunset Beach is just a five-minute walk down the road, while the beaches and nightlife of Camps Bay are an easy drive away. Cape Town itself is also just a short drive from your door, while just beyond the city is the vast and precious Table Mountain National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a quintessential Colorado ski holiday with a modern twist at Pop Art Villa. This ski-in, ski-out luxury property offers unparalleled access to the slopes from its setting in the exclusive Arrabelle at Vail Square, while its spacious interiors and sophisticated style make it a welcoming retreat after a day out in the mountains.Guests of the villa are welcome to use the shared rooftop lap pools and hot tubs, children’s room, fitness center and seasonal outdoor firepits at the Arrabelle at Vail Square. Pop Art also has its own underground parking spot, a furnished private balcony with a barbecue and entertainment options including a TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.This beautifully appointed vacation rental is laid out around an open-concept great room. Set a beverage on the oversized coffee table and settle into the sofa and chairs by the gas fireplace, catch up with friends and family around the dining table, or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a quick coffee or drink. Throughout the residence, subtle neutral tones and luxe textures are set off by the vibrant art collection for which the home is named.Pop Art Villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with borrowed-from-a-honeymoon-suite features such as a jetted bathtub. Like the great room, the bedrooms are furnished in refined contemporary style for a relaxed—and relaxing–vibe.A Vail Valley location puts you in the heart of the action. The villa is less than a 5-minute walk from Lionshead Village, the Born Free express lift and the Eagle Bahn gondola, and less than a 10-minute drive from Vail Village. (There’s also a shuttle available from the Arrabelle to Vail Village.) If you’re visiting outside of ski season, you’ll find several golf courses and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular beachfront villa is situated in the Conchas Chinas neighborhood just south of Puerto Vallarta. Built in a classic hacienda style with rose-colored facades and exquisite décor, the villa offers a unique yet quintessential experience of coastal Mexico. Five deluxe bedrooms suites accommodate up to ten guests, and the vacation rental includes a cook, butler, and housekeeping.Panoramic ocean views inspire almost every space in the home, while gracefully fused interiors and terraces invite you to dine, relax, and entertain in the sea-kissed breeze. Bathe in the refreshing waters of the infinite swimming bordering the dining room, and bask in the Pacific sun on loungers oriented toward the vast horizon. Relish your meals alfresco on the balcony, and linger to admire the sunset tableau.Wide thresholds lend an enchanting, open-air quality to the villa's cool interiors. Beautiful brick cupolas grace the dining and living rooms, conjuring an Old Mexico ambiance for memorable feasts and intimate gatherings. The fully equipped kitchen includes high-grade contemporary appliances along with exquisite rustic elements, such as the vaulted, wood-beamed ceiling and tile backsplash. Fine artwork and furnishings evoke the country's colonial, indigenous, and modernist traditions.Villa Marea Alta features four ocean-view bedroom suites with private terraces—three with king beds, one with a double bed—as well as a fifth room in a separate "casita" with king bed and twin daybed. All have ensuite bathrooms (the master's includes a superb tub) along with air conditioning, ceiling fans, safes, and televisions, providing dreamy havens for afternoon siestas and tranquil nights.Conchas Chinas is known as the Beverly Hills of Puerto Vallarta, with its fabulous blend of luxury homes, world-class beaches, and nearby nightlife. You're about eight hundred paces from Conchas Chinas Beach and within a short drive of the famed Playa Los Muertos. The Malecon esplanade of Puerto Vallarta is just three kilometers away. Golfers will enjoy several outstanding courses nearby, and watersport enthusiasts will find abundant opportunities along the coast of Jalisco. Proximity to the international airport makes Villa Marea Alta an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get to the cultural heart of Bali at Villa Kelusa. Perched in the foothills below the village of Kelusa, this private estate is only a few minutes from the restaurants, galleries, world-class hotels and more in Ubud. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property to unwind with extended family or take a totally relaxed holiday with friends.The villa features four buildings set on nearly eight acres of lush grounds overlooking the mountains and jungle. Take in the panoramas from the two infinity pools, the terraces with loungers or the al-fresco dining area—or even as you prep the evening meal on the barbecue. Other amenities include a cable TV, DVD player and Wi-Fi, as well as daily breakfast, and butler and shuttle service.Two separate, traditionally inspired houses make up Villa Kelusa: Pondok Sapi, or “shed of the cow,” and Pondok Surya, or “sunset house.” Designed as the residence of a retired American TV journalist, Pondok Sapi has an entertainment cabana with a lounge area, an open-air living pavilion with a fully equipped kitchen and a glass studio where the bedrooms are located. Pondok Surya has its own living area and a second fully equipped kitchen.There are two bedrooms in Pondok Sapi and two in Pondok Surya; all four have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and several have features worthy of a honeymoon suite, such as al-fresco showers.Many villas claim to be close to Bali’s beaches; the nearest attractions to this vacation rental are museums. Simply make the trip down the hill to Ubud to marvel over the art collections, visit the local market and take a tour of the royal palace and gardens. Of course, if you’d like a bit of sun and sand, Echo Beach, Kuta Beach and Nusa Dua Beach are all within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Catch the wind from your kite-board off Long Bay Beach, hunt for conch shells in the crystalline water, and stroll home barefoot to your private haven on Providenciales. Situated on the island's eastern shore, this contemporary cottage is just 500 paces from the beach and features panoramic ocean views from its upper balcony. Drive to Grace Bay in the villa's complimentary SUV or keep it simple with a poolside barbecue at sunset.The home is nestled on a gated property amid lush coastal flora, with a private swimming pool running 3 to 6 feet deep. Enjoy long hours sipping drinks under parasols, or curling up with a favorite book in the hammock or pod chair. Cook fresh fish on the grill in the evening light, and relish your meal alfresco on the balcony.The interior offers a cool sanctuary for afternoon downtime or festive nights. An open-concept layout includes a TV lounge, reading nook, 4-person dining table, and fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning and contemporary conveniences including Wi-Fi and a washer/dryer create a comfortable home base between island adventures.The master suite opens to a private, ocean-view balcony and features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. The guest suite, essentially a second master, opens to a wrap-around balcony with hammock. There is also a double-size sofa bed in the living room—perfect for kids or an extra guest.Located on the windward shore of Providenciales, Long Bay Beach is famous worldwide for its kite-boarding conditions, while its generally shallow waters can be ideal for swimming. The famous sands and restaurants of Grace Bay are just 3 kilometers away, and you're about 4 kilometers from Provo Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: While staying at Cocoland, you’ll be treated to gorgeous water views and private relaxation areas with palm trees. Sitting on the hillside of Pointe Milou, this elegant home features plenty of sun and is one of our top St. Barts villas. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is known for its upscale appeal for being both private and prestigious.On warm afternoons, go for a dip in the large pool, it’s surrounded by a deck with lounge chairs and tropical greenery and overlooks the sea. The backyard also features a private lawn with seating areas and water views. In the evenings, take advantage of the upper-level patio’s alfresco dining area and have a barbecue.From the patio, step into the living room—it opens up to the terrace, perfectly blending the comforts of indoor and outdoor living. The decor is a mix of colonial and contemporary styles with plush sofas and accents done in soft, neutral colors. A second sitting room offers more sofas while the fully equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. You’ll also find extra gadgets like a dishwasher, ice maker, and an espresso machine for early morning lattes.Up to four guests can stay in the villa’s two bedrooms on either side of living room, allowing for maximum privacy. Both feature king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions with DVD players.The beaches at St. Barts offer a bounty of activities from snorkeling to deep-sea fishing to wind surfing and sailing or simply just taking in some sun on the sand—the nearest one is just five minutes away. You’re also just 7.4 km to Gustavia, the island’s capital where you’ll find top-notch restaurants, shops and spas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This property has recently undergone significant landscaping and restoration. As a result, the exterior photos on this listing are not currently up to date.Set on an acre of lush tropical gardens and white sand beach, L’Embellie Beach Villa and Cottage is an elegant and secluded getaway destination in Anguilla. Surround yourself with the fragrances of lime trees, pineapples, plantain and banana plants. Bordered by 150 feet of secluded white sand beach and the shallow, protected waters of Forest Bay, this region of sunny Anguilla offers great snorkeling, fishing, kayaking and sailing.Tiled paths wind through the gardens and connect the two homes from the swimming pool with a bridge and umbrella covered tables to the private beach with hammock. The Beach Villa features a rooftop deck and offers a 180 degree view of the turquoise water, lounge chairs for private sunbathing and a shaded pergola, as well as a refrigerator and sink – perfect for coffee at sunrise, alfresco dining or a sundowner. The charming Garden Cottage sits among bougainvillea shrubs, coconut palms and spider lilies and is secluded from the Beach Villa. The buildings are connected via terracotta tiled paths. Housekeeping and management are included with your reservation.The interiors of L’Embellie are cool and bright, with accents of burnt sienna. The living room takes full advantage of the cool Caribbean trade winds, opening wide to shady terraces via mahogany double doors. The open plan space includes a dining area, plasma television, DVD player, cable and high-speed internet. The kitchen comes fully equipped for the culinary genius of the group or a personal chef at your request.The Beach Villa provides two bedroom suites, each with air conditioning, king beds, a connected outdoor shower and a television. The master suite has a double, deep bathtub and the guest suite includes an indoor shower. The cottage also contains an air conditioned bedroom with a queen bed and television, a private bathroom with indoor and outdoor shower and a galley kitchen/living room.Perfect for families, L’Embellie is located on Anguilla’s fabulous southern coast. You will have watersports, culture and nightlife right at your fingertips. In Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. History buffs can also stop in at the Heritage Museum or the Amerindian Ceremonial Site to take a glimpse into this island’s rich past.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Crisp white and rounded off by its roofline, this deceptively simple villa floats above the Santorini coast. Built into the hillside’s volcanic soil, it’s been remodeled into a futuristic lair—and a hole cut from the ceiling to let the Greek-island sunshine filter through the hot tub and ripple on the walls. It’s a short drive to Thera and the seafood-restaurant-lined shores of Exo Yalos Beach.Start each morning of your holiday at this vacation rental with the complimentary breakfast, then bring a book or headphones out to the furnished balcony overlooking the sea. There’s both a jetted plunge pool and a hot tub where you can soak while watching boats ply the waters below. And while the villa may have started as a cave, it’s fully in the 21st century with its smart TV, sound system, and Wi-Fi.Wall-to-wall glass lets light pour into the open-concept living area—as does a skylight cut beneath the upper-level hot tub. The sunshine bounces off the polished concrete floors and white walls around a dining table for 4, a fully equipped kitchen hidden behind folding doors, and a sitting area with a sculptural coffee table.Thanks to the open-plan layout, even the intimate bedroom at the back of this luxury property has ocean views. It also has a queen bed and a private ensuite bathroom, making it just right for a couple on their honeymoon or looking to relive it while in Greece.The villa is a short drive from Thera, the island’s main town, where you can wander amid whitewashed houses, peer over the breathtakingly high cliffs at the edge of the city, or take a cable car down to the water’s edge. It’s also an easy trip to the volcano-dark sand of Exo Yalos Beach, where you can rent a lounger or dine on fresh fish and squid at a waterfront restaurant, and the family-friendly waters of Monolithos Beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is an ongoing construction project near this property. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Put yourself into the perfect London pied-à-terre at Mayfair Two. Nestled into the heart of the Mayfair neighborhood, this bijou vacation rental is within walking distance of world-class shopping, dining, museums and more. Its one bedroom makes it just the right size for a couples getaway or a city honeymoon.After a day of sightseeing, come back to a villa with all the amenities of home: a TV, air conditioning and heating to keep you comfortable no matter what the London weather, and laundry facilities to ensure you’re ready for the next day’s adventures. Wi-Fi access makes it easy to stay in touch with friends and family.Mayfair Two’s bright, open-concept living and dining room takes its inspiration from the days of mod London, with a jewel-toned sofa and dining chairs, sleek accent tables and a plush beni ourain–style area rug. The separate kitchen has a practical galley layout and is fully equipped, with high-contrast white cabinets and glossy dark countertops.The villa’s single bedroom has a king bed, TV and en-suite bathroom. It’s a hotel-worthy private retreat with serene silver-toned carpet and wallpaper, floor-length drapes, built-in storage and subtly mid-century-inspired nightstands. Plenty of stone tile gives the bathroom a vibe of spa-like luxury.You could easily spend a holiday exploring the shops and restaurants of this part of Mayfair. Hunt down one-of-a-kind finds at the Dover Street Market, or browse the boutiques on New Bond Street, Oxford Street and Regent Street. The apartment is less than a 15-minute walk from iconic London destinations such as Hyde Park and Piccadilly Circus and, for royal fans, it’s less than a 20-minute drive to Kensington Palace and Buckingham Palace. It’s also less than half an hour by taxi—or Tube—to must-sees such as Westminster Abbey, Big Ben and the London Eye.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Novelist James Michener called Marigot Bay, “the most beautiful bay in the Caribbean.” Stepping out onto the terrace of Villa Ashiana, you’ll see why. The home is a tribute to classic colonial design with hints of old-world charm. Terraces, patios and decks allow you to take in the stunning bay view, where yachts and sailboats stream to and fro across turquoise waters.Spend your days on the sun-drenched pool terrace. Relax in a chaise longue and when the sun gets too hot, open a canvas parasol or take a dip in the large pool. Settle into one of the lounge sets on the ground floor patio, amid elegant columns. When dusk approaches, gather your guests with a cocktail and watch the sun set across the horizon. An outdoor barbecue allows you to grill up fresh local seafood which you can serve at the al fresco table.Inside, soft living room sofas and chairs will lure you in, providing maximum comfort while you enjoy a movie on the flatscreen television. The ground floor’s two living rooms, dining room and kitchen are laid out in an open concept plan, divided into sections by more columns and lush potted tropical plants. The chef-appointed kitchen will inspire you to create memorable feasts and a cook is also available to prepare meals. Savor every bite around a beautiful glass dining table.All five bedrooms are on the upper floor and each is individually decorate with tasteful linens and furnishings: four-poster bed, rattan chairs and floral patterns to name a few. The first three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms while the remaining two share facilities. Air conditioning cools each room and an open-air patio wraps the floor.When you’re ready to feel the sand between your toes, a ferry will zip you across to a gorgeous beach. Sailing is the lifeblood of Marigot Bay and you’ll have no trouble chartering a boat for an excursion to the famous Pitons or simply renting a sailboat to whip around the bay. When you’re back on land, you’ll find several good dining options in town. Shoppers will enjoy a day trip to Castries and the duty free Pointe Seraphine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gorgeous Villa Solemar is a wonderfully tranquil haven for relaxing and exploring Ambergris Cave, the largest island of Belize located northeast in the beautiful Caribbean Sea.At Villa Solemar the morning greets you with a spectacular sunrise beyond the azure Caribbean Sea. Comfortable and elegantly casual for guests of all ages, the interior of Villa Solemar highlights the talent of local craftsmen and artists. The fully equipped gourmet kitchen contains all you need to create an extra special island meal or tropical drink to be enjoyed on the spacious poolside verandah. It’s the perfect setting to watch the sunrise over the reef as you enjoy your morning coffee or a place to linger in the evening for stargazing. Your verandah allows instant access to the beautiful pool accented with tropical planters.When the sun goes down, browse through the DVD selection and relax in front of one of the flat-screen televisions, borrow a book from the shelf, or settle at the large dining table for a game of cards or some great dining and conversation. Whether your vacation includes quality time with family or a celebration with friends, Villa Solemar offers a memorable retreat where you can appreciate the magic of Belize.The three bedrooms, each with a king size bed, celebrate the natural diversity of Belize with hand-carved headboards and artwork representing the island, the reef, and the rainforest. A full size futon and queen sofa bed provide additional sleeping options to accommodate parties of up to eight guests.San Pedro Town is the only town on the island and is 3 miles away. It’s 1 mile to the tennis and basketball courts. From the beautiful azure waters of the Caribbean, to the Maya Mountains and the Pine Ridge, Belize has an adventure for everyone. Home to the second largest coral reef in the world, it’s a hub for snorkel or scuba diving. The reef lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25-mile length of the island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Skyfall is a stunning example of 1960’s architecture that transcends its era to remain a timeless beacon of luxury. Located in the rugged foothills of the San Jacinto Mountains, in a quiet corner of South Palm Springs, you’ll be treated inspiring mountain and valley views. The villa’s aesthetic is worthy of a James Bond movie and at any moment you’ll expect 007 himself to come striding out.The villa wraps the spacious circular terrace where water from an elevated hot tub cascades down into the pool. The terrace is complete with everything you need to enjoy blissful days under the sun: chaise lounges, a couch and vintage Eero Aarnio fiberglass chairs. During summer months you can cool off in the home’s outdoor misting system, while a circular overhang and freestanding parasols offer relief from the desert heat.The home’s rounded interior complements the pool terrace and boasts sleek, clean lines and modern décor. The great room’s signature floor-to-ceiling windows look out over the pool and beyond to the lights of Palm Springs. Vibrant upholstery and art add flashes of color throughout the home, including the cozy turquoise sofas where you can unwind and chat with guests. You’ll love preparing feasts in the gourmet kitchen. Fully-equipped and featuring an impressive double-oven, the kitchen is anchored around a large center island. Meals can be savored in the formal dining room or poolside at an al fresco table.The large Master suite is found at the North end of the home. It features a King size bed, sectional sofa, flatscreen television and access to a semi-private terrace. Its spa-like en-suite houses a walk-in shower, dual vanities and a beautiful Eero Aarnio Ball Chair. The second Master suite is at the home’s South end. It also contains a King size bed and private en-suite, as well as direct access to the pool terrace. The remaining bedroom is a Queen suite with a private patio. It has access to a well-appointed hallway bathroom.Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking either outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just minutes from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants, spas and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 2598Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Spend a dreamy holiday within view of the Kohala Mountains at Kamilo 331. Whether you’d like to relax with friends or entertain the extended family, this four-bedroom Big Island vacation rental makes it easy. Spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, plus a location close to beaches, golf, shopping and dining, will set you up nicely for a memorable stay.This luxury property opens to a generous lanai with shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, a barbecue, a sunny terrace with loungers, and a swimming pool and hot tub. After a day by the pool or on the beach, a smart TV, wine cooler and Wi-Fi will help you unwind before bed. For your comfort and convenience, the villa also has air conditioning, ceiling fans and laundry facilities.At the heart of Kamilo 331 is a perfectly Hawaiian great room, with a slide-away glass wall leading to the lanai and an open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A ceiling of woven panels paired with a color scheme of cream and blue creates a simple, stylish vibe.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in the guest house, or ohana. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite that opens to its own furnished terrace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. The guest house has a second master suite with a king bed, perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Guests are welcome to use the shared pools, barbecue areas and fitness center in the Kamilo private community, as well as the beach club at the nearby Mauna Lani Resort. The villa is within walking distance of restaurants and shops, so you can dine out or pick up something for the barbecue, and less than a 3-mile drive from the nearest golf course and beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-101-096-2432-01

listing.listing_description: Reconstructed in traditional Tuscan style, this farmhouse captures the scenic forest and valley views of Casali di Casole. Follow stone walkways connected each living space on this vast property, stopping every-now-and-again to spot a deer or pheasant. Inside, imposing architecture invites unmatched authenticity to your dinner parties. Or, dine at the estate's restaurant, just across the meadow.San Damiano's kitchen is sure to inspire your inner chef with its top-notch appliances, spacious layout, and vibrant backsplash. When the others come to see what you're up to, give them a sneak peek to enjoy at the bistro-set on the balcony. When you're ready, dine under the chandeliers in the formal setting. But first, pick the perfect pairing from the wine cellar.After dinner, let the party spill out to the terrace. Gather at the alfresco set for dessert and a cocktail or 2. When things heat up, turn it into a pool party or embrace San Damiano's relaxing side and move to the hot tub. If you're craving a late-night snack, pizza from the wood-fired oven is always a delicious bet. Then, retire to the master's spa-like ensuite and 4-post bed.Once you've explored the hiking, biking, and horseback trails of the Casali Estate, venture on to Siena and check out the view from Torre del Mangia, the cities highest lookout. Then, make your way to the Uffizi Gallery in Florence to see the works of Giotto, Michelangelo, and Botticelli, to name a few. And, compare your work to that of Mangia Pizza Firenze, one of Florence's best traditional pizza restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A bohemian-modern retreat steps from downtown Palm Springs, Hinshaw Hideaway is the former winter escape of JCW and Wilberta Hinshaw, developers of the historic La Plaza shopping center. Built in 1934, the sprawling 3-bedroom, 3.5-bath ranch sits on landscaped grounds in the Movie Colony district, a 10-minute stroll from restaurants, galleries, and shopping. Styled in a mix of mid-century modern and Renaissance-era decor with modern technology throughout. Hinshaw Hideaway is an eclectic escape that invites relaxation. The home opens onto a cozy sitting area with a velvet ottomon facing a decorative fireplace, a unique church pew bench, and a stained-glass window. A colorful stained-glass chandelier hangs above a 6-seat dining table. Just off this room is a fully-equipped kitchen designed for entertaining, featuring stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and a wine fridge. Beyond the living area is a light-filled living room, which opens onto the expansive outdoor patio through sliding doors. On one end, a full-length leather sofa and two Herman Eames chairs, accented by fur, face a chic, glass-topped wet bar crafted with a natural finish and a live edge. A turntable sets the scene for entertaining. For the real entertainment, however, just step outside. A resort-style, heated swimming pool lies at the center of an impressive, South-facing backyard lined with palm trees and surrounded by a lush, 10-foot privacy wall. Soak in the sun in one of the cozy loungers along one end of the pool, or catch up with friends around on cushioned sitting area around a stone fireplace along the other. In a separate corner, a hot tub with 18 jets faces a second stone outdoor fireplace and outdoor bar area. Three more sitting areas surround the pool to provide ample room for entertaining, including a 6-seat dining table. With a BBQ grill and 6-seat outdoor dining table, you can easily enjoy dinner al fresco. Between three spacious bedrooms, Hinshaw Hideaway comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests. Each bedroom, located in a separate corner of the home for privacy, features a Casper Wave mattress and Casper pillows. The master suite, located off the East end of the living area, is styled in rustic, mid-century decor with wood-paneled walls, a king-sized bed and a leather lounge chair. This room also has a 55” flat-screen TV and a luxurious bathroom with marble walls and a soaker tub. The suite opens onto the backyard through glass doors, steps from a cushioned sitting area shaded by umbrellas. The second bedroom, located in the Southwest corner, is styled in eclectic decor with a stained glass door, and unique built-in desk. This bedroom has a Queen size bed and ensuite bath with a walk-in shower. The third bedroom, located on the Northwest corner, is whimsically styled with a four-post, king-sized bed, a Southwestern-style sofa and a decorative vintage TV. This room also has an ensuite bath and walk-in shower. A sliding glass door leads to the backyard. For added convenience, this home also features a private washer and dryer and an additional half-bath. A spacious driveway with charging station provides room for up to 3 cars, giving you the freedom to explore the surrounding desert, including Joshua Tree, located less than an hour away. Of course, with the restaurants, shops, galleries and parks of downtown Palm Springs opening a world of entertainment options for every mood a 10-minute stroll away, you can spend your vacation car-free. Walk to Wellness Park and meditate in the garden, wander through antique stores, or find an open tennis court at Ruth Hardy Park. Palm Springs City ID # 3458

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of downtown Ketchum, this stylish new building enjoys instant walking access to the city’s vibrant Main Street. As well, Kneebone Penthouse is situated just one block from the free shuttle to Sun Valley Ski Resort, so it’s easy to get around without a vehicle if your group decides to split up for the day. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, Ketchum is also home to some excellent golf and exciting outdoor activities like hiking, rock climbing, and mountain biking.Newly built, this industrial-chic apartment spares no expense when it comes to mountain village luxury. You’ll love lounging on plush designer furniture as you gaze out the floor-to-ceiling windows onto soaring mountain views. Return home each day to a roaring fire, warm wood tones, and stylish, modern decor. When it’s time to retire for the evening, your group of up to six will have either a king or queen sized bed and a lavishly adorned en-suite to enjoy, all with views of the village and distant mountain range.Kneebone Penthouse comes with a fully equipped, modern kitchen with a social breakfast bar, and formal dining area. Guests will appreciate the state of the art appliances and electronics found throughout the villa, as well as Wi-Fi, cable television, and central air conditioning. In the summer months, Kneebone expands its hosting space out the balcony and rooftop patio, decorated with outdoor furniture, a bocce court, and spectacular mountain views.Sun Valley and Dollar Mountain ski resorts are both located within a five-minute drive of the penthouse, so you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes bright and early each morning. After a long day on the slopes, refresh and rejuvenate at Frenchman’s Bend Hot Spring, a favorite hangout among locals and vacationers alike. In the evening, Ketchum is home to lots of great restaurants, ranging from casual pubs to fine French, Italian, and American dining. If you’d prefer something a little more laid-back, check the show listings at the Magic Lantern Cinema or pop into Whiskey Jacque’s to check out some live music and a great selection of drinks.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Conveniently located in Beverly Hills, this ultra-luxurious smart home is within minutes of so many of Los Angeles' amazing attractions. With four en-suite bedrooms and huge open-concept living room, The Cosmopolitan is ideal for hosting family and friends. Whether you're in town for business, pleasure, or a bit of both, Luxury Retreats has the perfect home base for your Los Angeles vacation.The spacious main floor is decorated with the highest-end designer furniture, a beautiful modern-contemporary fireplace, and eclectic works of art. A wide opening to backyard helps fill the interior with fresh air and natural sunlight and provides additional space when hosting. The formal dining area, kitchen, and lounge all occupy their own areas within the main floor, encouraging a social atmosphere, perfect for an elegant dinner soiree and whatever else the night has in store.The Cosmopolitan is outfitted with Smart home technology and pre-wired for any technical situation. Wi-Fi, cable television, a sound system, and air conditioning will make you feel right at home. In the kitchen, there's state of the art appliances, a dishwasher, espresso machine, and a formal dining area with space for ten. Outside, the saltwater swimming pool and hot tub will help you relax and unwind after an exciting day downtown. If you're planning a beach trip, you've come to the right city. Malibu, Venice, and Santa Monica Beach are all world-class beach communities, and they're all within twenty miles. For shopping, Rodeo Drive can't be beat, featuring boutiques from the world's most famous fashion designers. If you're traveling with children, or the young at heart, Universal Studios and Disneyland are both easily accessible. And, if there's a golfer in your entourage, Wilson and Harding Golf Course is one of Los Angeles' finest.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb townhome is located at 205 Main Street, an exclusive luxury condo development ideally situated in the heart of Park City, a short walk from Town Lift. The stylish yet cozy vacation rental blends classic alpine elements with sophisticated contemporary design, including a gourmet kitchen, outdoor hot tub, and gorgeous artwork and fixtures. Three bedrooms including a kid-friendly bunkroom form an ideal home base for family mountain vacations in this jewel of the Rockies.The open-plan interior features a spacious salon with a sumptuous sofa facing a stone fireplace. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip hot cocoa or red wine while recounting the day's adventures, and step onto the balcony for a soothing soak in the alfresco spa. Prepare hearty meals in the chef-grade kitchen, relish them around the dining table for eight, and cuddle up in the media room with your favorite shows and films. The villa's exquisite décor blends rustic wood accents, luminous white finishes, and exquisite artwork that harmonizes modernist style with indigenous patterns, evoking both the timeless traditions and cutting-edge culture of Park City.All three bedroom suites feature air conditioning and ensuite bathrooms, two with jetted tubs. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and sitting area, while the primary guest suite includes a queen bed and private balcony. The charming bunk room offers two twin-size beds (sleeping four in all).With its balance of serenity and convenience, there is hardly a finer location in Park City than 205 Main Street. You can easily walk to Town Lift Plaza to access the extraordinary slopes and trails of Park City Mountain Resort, or drive about five minutes to the resort base (the vacation rental includes two underground parking spots). Deer Valley and Park City Golf Course are also a short drive away, while the heart of Historic Main Street is just steps down the road.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make the most of your Caribbean holiday at Afimi. Not only is this Montego Bay vacation rental just 10 minutes from the airport, it boasts a full staff and a postcard-worthy location on a calm lagoon. Spend less time traveling, and more time enjoying the company of friends or family under the Jamaican sun.Your holiday at Afimi includes the services of a full-time cook, butler, housekeeper and gardener; airport transfers can also be arranged through the villa’s driver. Thanks to its location in the exclusive Lagoons gated community, guests are welcome at the shared pool, tennis courts and fitness center. Of course, the villa also has its own resort-worthy outdoor living areas with space for lounging and dining, a barbecue and al-fresco bar, an infinity pool overlooking the private beach, and snorkeling equipment, sailboats and kayaks for exploring the bay.Fold-away glass doors connect the villa’s terrace to its interiors, which are filled with an appealing mix of modern pieces and Jamaican antiques for a feel of eclectic luxury. Built-in bookcases lend a sense of elegance to the living room, while in the kitchen, an island layout encourages mingling. A formal indoor dining area has seating for eight.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and water views. There are two suites with king beds, including a master bedroom, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds.At Afimi, the sparkling waters and sugary sands that make Jamaica such a popular destination for warm-weather getaways and honeymoons are at your doorstep. But there’s plenty more to see and do in the neighborhood. It’s less than a 5-minute drive to the uniquely charming Houseboat restaurant and the Montego Bay Yacht Club, and there are three golf courses within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: King's Villa is a golfer's delight outside Scottsdale, Arizona, within easy reach of several renowned courses including Orange Tree, TPC Scottsdale, and Camelback. The home is perfectly designed and equipped for a memorable getaway with friends or family, featuring a private swimming pool, putting green, pool table, gourmet kitchen, and beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco. High-end media features (including a video game console) and air-conditioned interiors create a comfortable atmosphere for guests of all ages. Four ample bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to twelve guests.Nestled amid high walls and lush trees, the villa's terrace offers a lovely venue for serene relaxation or festive celebrations. Step into the swimming pool for a refreshing dip and sunbathe under the clear Southwestern skies. Practice your short game on the lush green before enjoying some of the finest courses in the American West. Return to barbeques meals in the cool veranda and joyous nights under the desert stars.The veranda flows gracefully into the villa’s interiors, with glass doors opening to a lovely billiard room and comfy TV den. The luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances, a farmhouse-modern island, and a window bar opening to the veranda, easily serving both the outdoor and indoor dining tables. The spacious salon beside the dining room is perfect for evening cocktails or late-night movies.The cavernous master bedroom is superbly appointed for a couple, with a king bed, private living area with fireplace and TV, bar area with wine fridge, walk-in closet, and fabulous indoor/outdoor ensuite bathroom. There are two large guestrooms with king beds and a shared bathroom, and a third room with queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom. All are furnished with premium linens and accouterments. The kids' room has two twin-size bunk beds, sleeping four children in all.In addition to extraordinary golf courses, you're within ten to twenty minutes of wonderful hiking trails, superb spas, and myriad sporting opportunities. The cutting-edge art galleries and restaurants of Scottsdale are just eleven miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Luxuriously equipped Caribbean Soul Villa is set in a fabulous beachfront oasis affording unobstructed views of Ambergris Caye, Belize’s largest island, northeast in the Caribbean Sea.On the first floor, an opulent marble-decked verandah welcomes you to the entrance of Caribbean Soul. Inside you’ll discover brightly colored paintings, amazingly detailed wooden carved sculptures and beautifully woven tapestries adorning the entire villa, celebrating the vast talents of local artists. Tiled marble floors and vaulted ceilings accentuate how open and spacious this villa is. Step inside the oversized living room and take in that uncompromising view through the 20ft. long wall of windows and glass doors, opening directly onto the verandah. Furnished handsomely with comfortable seating for at least 12 people, the enormous living room boasts a 50" plasma high definition television and an iHome iPod stereo docking station with subwoofer, as well as Wi-Fi and cable television. A fully equipped gourmet kitchen with granite countertops and a breakfast bar with seating for four, offers every kitchen convenience imaginable, with state of the art appliances and cookware. The dining room can host eight people and you can dine overlooking the spectacular views.Your private, fully furnished poolside verandah is a gorgeous outdoor space overlooking the reef. It’s the perfect place to watch the sun as it sets over the lagoon or rises over the ocean.Your three luxuriously furnished, restful bedrooms all feature en-suite bathrooms. The master suite looks out across the ocean, and offers dazzling sunrise views from its king size bed. The luxurious marble bathroom features a whirlpool bathtub, a marble standing shower, and dual marble sinks and is joined to the bedroom by a walk-through closet. The bedroom is also furnished with a 32" high definition flat panel television. The "French Door" bedroom - given the name because of its glass-paned double French doors - enjoys views of the ocean and pool. There’s also a queen size bed, oversized closets and a private, marble bathroom with standing shower. The "Sunset" bedroom, also complete with private marble bathroom, standing shower and ample closet space, has its own external private entrance. This bedroom is furnished with a king bed and affords fabulous sunset views in the evening.Come to Belize and experience your Caribbean Soul! San Pedro Town, the only town on the island, is just 3 miles away. Belize’s famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25 mile length of the island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to stunning views and modern luxury at Turtle Ridge Villa. Set just above the turquoise waters of Grace Bay, with windows that perfectly frame the horizon, this Turks and Caicos vacation rental will have you constantly reaching for your camera. Use the villa’s well-appointed spaces to entertain or as a base to explore nearby beaches, restaurants, shops and bars.Drive through the villa’s gates and onto resort-style landscaped grounds. You’ll only need to step up to the entrance to see through the central hall to the ocean beyond, but you’ll want to step out onto the private terrace with an infinity pool, loungers and daybeds, and sitting and dining areas. A covered outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and ice maker makes it easy to serve up both meals and refreshments.Retractable glass walls lead from the terrace to the great room at Turtle Ridge Villa, allowing you to create one large indoor-outdoor living space. In the sitting and dining areas, furnishings in creams and blues echo the colors of the island’s famed white-sand beaches, while dark wood and pale stone floors create a classic high-contrast Caribbean look. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for both cooks and diners, with gourmet appliances, a wine fridge and a breakfast bar.The villa’s three bedrooms are enough to host up to six friends and family members—or even just a party of two on a decadent honeymoon. All three have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, making a holiday here just as comfortable as one at a resort or hotel.Turtle Ridge Villa is less than a 5-minute walk from gorgeous Grace Bay Beach—frequently named one of the world’s best for its white sands and clear water. From there, continue on to the unique landscape of Princess Alexandra National Park, or to the oceanfront restaurants and shops at the resorts lining Grace Bay. It’s also a short drive from the villa to the local tennis courts, golf club, marina and, when it’s time to leave, the airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: In Pointe Milou, just 7 km from the airport, you’ll find this well-appointed home, recently renovated, and offering up some of the best sunset views of all our St. Barts villas. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, offers some of the top restaurants in the Caribbean as well as some of the best shopping around.Enjoy stunning views of the sea while lounging on one of the sun chairs on the tiled terrace. They surround the infinity-edge pool, a refreshing way to cool down on hot days. This backyard space also includes an outdoor seating area and a barbecue for an evening of casual dining. Those who need to stay connected can take advantage of the Wi-Fi access.Within the home, the decor is contemporary and features an open-design concept. The living room opens up to terrace and offers views of the sea, plush sofas, glass coffee tables and a zebra-print area rug. Vaulted ceilings with fans keeps things cool, while the nearby equipped kitchen is loaded with gadgets to make cold drinks, including an ice maker, blender and a beverage fridge.The villa’s three bedrooms overlook the sea and can accommodate up to six guests—all offer en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning as well as televisions with DVD players. Two rooms include queen-sized beds while the third bedroom’s two twin beds can be converted into a queen bed.The beach closest to this charming home is Lorient, a reef-protected spot with calm waters perfect for swimming. This spot tends to be less crowded than some of the other, better-known beaches. Meanwhile, the island’s capital, Gustavia, is just 7.4 km away. Here you’ll find plenty of sightseeing attractions as well as diverse restaurants, boutiques and gift shops.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Waves overlooks Shoal Bay along the north shore of Anguilla, perched on a lofty headland about five minutes from the beach. Enjoying panoramic views of the coastline and sea, the superbly designed home features an ample private swimming pool, high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment, and beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco. Three ample bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate six travelers, ideal for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Your vacation rental at Villa Waves includes a property manager and daily housekeeping service, and numerous other deluxe services are available.The villa blends a modern sensibility with a vintage Caribbean elegance, featuring glowing white surfaces, rich accents of natural wood, and ample outdoor living areas for savoring the sea-kissed breeze. Refresh yourself with a dip in the swimming pool, and bathe in the sun on lounge chairs overlooking the vast horizon. Dine alfresco in the cool shade of the pergola, and relax in the outdoor living room during the sublime sunset hour.The spacious interior living room features glass doors opening to the pool terrace. Wide thresholds lead into the ample, open-concept kitchen and dining room, with an exquisite table for eight and lovely lounge areas set beneath high wood ceilings. The kitchen is fully equipped for the contemporary gourmet, with top-of-the-line appliances, a wine fridge, a drink prep area, and a breakfast bar.The master suite enjoys a privileged, corner position, with expansive ocean views from its king bed and pergola-shaded terrace. Its deluxe ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, shower, and tub. Each of the guest suites features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. One opens directly to the pool, opposite the master suite, with lovely ocean views through glass French windows. There is air conditioning in the bedrooms and living room.Villa Waves is a short drive from Shoal Bay Beach as well as Valley (the island's capital city), and about fourteen kilometers from CuisinArt Resort Golf Course, home to a fabulous Greg Norman-designed golf course. The international airport is about six kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Paraiso offers you sumptuous luxury and style in the impeccable beachfront oasis of Belizean Cove Estates, overlooking Ambergris Caye in the magical Caribbean.Welcome to Villa Paraiso, where your day starts with the spectacular sunrise beyond the dazzling Caribbean Sea. Spacious and opulently finished Villa Paraiso is resplendent in cream with pillared fittings, high ceilings and marble finishes. Colorful and exotic artwork by local artists adorns the walls and provides interesting and striking highlights. Comfortable yet elegantly furnished, a main feature of Villa Paraiso is its large living space where you can really enjoy family time. Opening up the French doors you enter your private terrace and beyond the lush and stunning pool area. Why not take a dip or take some time out in the hot tub? If you’d prefer to feel the sand between your toes, the beach is just a short stroll from this luxurious pool area. From here you can also take out a sea kayak and go exploring the sparkling Caribbean.In the evening head inside and browse the DVD collection. Relax in front of one of several flat-screen televisions, curl up with a good book or prepare a meal in your fully equipped kitchen and entertain friends or family in the spacious dining area that seats six.After a hard day relaxing, your three restful and luxurious bedrooms await! All feature opulent marble bathrooms for your utmost comfort. Decorated with colorful local artwork and floral bedding they’ll envelop you in the vibrancy and tranquility of the Caribbean. The master bedroom offers a king size bed and adjoining spacious bathroom with shower, whirlpool tub and double sinks. The second bedroom is ideal for families with young children with its queen bed and twin day bed. Enjoying its own separate entrance leading out to the garden, the third bedroom is furnished with a king size bed.Villa Paraiso is the perfect location to appreciate the magic of Belize. The only town on the island, San Pedro Town, is just 3 miles away, and you can also visit the tennis and basketball courts that are just one mile away. The island is home to the famous coral reef, second largest in the world, and runs the length of the whole island. The airport is just 5.5 km away._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the fabulous Grace Bay area of the Turks and Caicos, Villa Islander comes together in a symphony of cool greys and copious natural wood. Just a two minute walk from the white sands at Coral Garden Beach, which is part of Princess Alexandra National Park, this stunning vacation rental is situated in perhaps the most picturesque area of this Caribbean island. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!The striking grounds at Villa Islander feature an L-shaped swimming pool, a reflecting pool, alfresco dining, a gas barbeque and an alfresco shower. With plenty of sun loungers, a rooftop terrace, beach chairs, parasols and outdoor speakers, the party can get bumping in no time. Interior perks include a wine fridge, Smart Television, sound system and Wi-Fi. There’s also a study in case you need to stay on top of work while away. Your reservation includes complimentary housekeeping and security. Chef, massage, babysitting and pre-stocking services can be booked at an additional cost.The floor plan of Villa Islander is spacious and optimizes seamless indoor/outdoor living. The furnishings are comfortable and contemporary. Cool off in the living area with a good book and an even better glass of wine. The adjacent dining area includes a glass top table and retro lighting. The fully equipped kitchen provides a center island with gas hobs.Four phenomenal bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom features a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, rain shower and terrace access. The master suite also includes a dual vanity and a bidet. Two suites are located in the main house, and two suites are in the guest house. The layout facilitates gentle oscillations between private time and socializing. This villa makes a great bet for a family getaway or a special event like a wedding or birthday.Grace Bay has been awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should also be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. Live it up in Turks and Caicos!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
