listing.listing_description: This enchanting villa is situated within a private, gated community along the west coast of the island of Phuket, within walking distance of Surin Beach. It was designed by Ernesto Bedmar and features beautiful natural materials that harmonize with the lush coastline and timeless sea, while high-end appliances and amenities provide an exquisite luxury experience. Professional staff and services include a private chef, housekeeping, and a villa manager.The villa offers ample opportunity to savor its extraordinary vistas of Surin Bay while savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. The tiered deck features two pools: a kid-friendly pool with jets and a main pool with infinite edge that fuses with the turquoise expanse. A sala pavilion features sumptuous daybeds, while a shaded table invites you to alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze. At sunset, gather for cocktails on the rooftop terrace and behold the sunset over the Andaman Sea.Sliding glass doors open to the main pavilion, infusing the living areas with ocean light and alfresco ambiance. Sectional sofas in the lounge are ideal for nighttime gatherings, while the dining table seats eight for home-cooked feasts. The villa includes a separate entertainment room as well as a private fitness room, and its Western and Asian-style kitchens are fully equipped with chef-grade appliances.The villa features a master suite with a king bed, two guest suites with one double bed each, and a kid-friendly suite with a double bed and bunk bed. Each suite is well appointed with an ensuite bathroom, desk, lounge, safe, and ceiling fan, and all enjoy balconies and ocean views. The vaulted master suite is on the upper level and enjoys particularly sublime vistas from its furnished balcony, while its bathroom includes a soaking tub beside a picture window.The villa offers a fine balance of exquisite privacy and convenient proximity to the cultural, natural, and sporting riches of Phuket. You can walk to Surin Beach or drive a few minutes of Kamala Beach, while golf-lovers can take their pick of Phuket Golf Center, Laguna Golf Resort, and Loch Palm. Families will love the FantaSea theme park, less than three kilometers away. Proximity to Phuket International Airport makes this villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Positioned to capture breathtaking sunsets and endless ocean views, villa Sonnekus enjoys its prestigious perch in the trendy Camps Bay area of Cape Town. With three luxurious bedrooms and stylish decor, this scenic apartment is perfect for a family getaway or couples retreat. The Camps Bay Beach area is well-known for its wide selection of restaurants and pristine beachfront, which is just a two-minute walk from Sonnekus.Thoughtfully designed, this modern apartment has everything you’ll need to fall in love with Cape Town. The open main room contains the sleek corner kitchen, television lounge, formal dining table, and a door to the balcony. The dark wood flooring adds a touch of warmth to the calming white walls and stainless steel that decorate the main living area. You’ll appreciate Sonnekus’ modern designer furniture, which adds colorful accents throughout the apartment. And, wide, floor-to-ceiling windows frame beautiful views of the ocean and beach.Sonnekus is outfitted with only the highest end appliances, fixtures, and finishings in its fully equipped kitchen, three bedrooms, and two bathrooms. If you’re thinking of hosting, the formal dining area has seating for four, and parking is available within the apartment’s gated property. Sonnekus’ other features include television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a balcony with an incredible ocean view.After you’ve spent a day or two on Camps Bay Beach, and night trying out the different restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, head into downtown Cape Town for even more options, shopping, and exciting nightlife. If you’d like to get a lay of the land, take the ninety-minute hike up Lion’s Head, where you’ll be rewarded with a some of the best views in the city.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The city version of a traditional ski lodge, this downtown villa has all the mountain-style, and it’s walking distance to Park City’s Main Street. Size-up the ski slopes from the living room’s cozy leather sofa while you finish your espresso. Then, grab your gear from the ski storage area and head out. On your way, stop in to check out the latest gear at the boutique shops lining Main Street.Treasure Hollow’s trendy townhouse-layout gives each space a unique vibe and flow. The expertly organized kitchen and breakfast bar make tremendous use of their small space. From there, the dining area and double-sided fireplace lead the way to the living room, where the flat-screen TV sits above the mantle. And, the second living room downstairs is the perfect place for the kids to hang out.The Sunday Market in Park City is a great place to pick up some local produce and organic meat for the barbecue. After you’ve eaten, mix up a few festive cocktails at the wet bar gather in the living room to enjoy the view while you catch up with old friends. Later, move the party outside to the hot tub. In the warmer months, outdoor furniture adds another space to gather. And, the villa comes with 2 parking spots.With Main Street and the Sunday Market both within walking distance, you’ll have everything you need nearby. When it’s time to hit the slopes, Park City, Deer Valley, and Canyons Village are all with 5 miles of home. If there’s a golfer in the group, Park City Golf Course offers challenging fairways and dynamic landscapes, especially for those who haven’t been mountain-golfing yet.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-chalet style shows off its contemporary side at Spruce Ledge. This newly built Breckenridge townhouse is a modern take on the Colorado mountain lodge, with spacious open-concept interiors and four bedrooms that can accommodate groups of twelve. Perhaps best of all, its location in the exclusive Shock Hill neighborhood is just steps from the BreckConnect gondola.In warmer weather, you can take in views of the neighboring Cucumber Gulch Preserve from a private balcony with a barbecue, gas fireplace and al-fresco hot tub. After a day on the ski slopes, pour refreshments from the wine fridge or wet bar, flip on the cable TV or Sonos sound system, or share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.At the heart of this luxury vacation rental is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and picturesque forest views. The L-shaped layout puts the sitting and dining areas on either side and the fully equipped kitchen at the center. Throughout the open-concept space, details such as neutral-toned furnishings, a gas fireplace and marble countertops are both stylish and inviting.Spruce Ledge has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, there’s also a bunk room with two queen bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.A stay at Spruce Ledge puts you close to the best of the Breckenridge action. The villa is a 6-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola, the nearest ski run and everything from souvenir shopping to honeymoon-worthy dinners on Main Street in Breckenridge. It’s also less than 10 minutes from sledding and tubing in Carter Park and, for true outdoor enthusiasts, great hiking and cross-country skiing in Cucumber Gulch Preserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It’s all in the name at The View. This glorious Big Sky retreat delivers stunning panoramas from beautifully designed indoor and outdoor living areas. In the summer, use this vacation rental as a base to get out and explore Montana; in the winter, take advantage of ski-in, ski-out access to make first tracks.Look out over Lone Peak from a furnished deck with al-fresco dining for ten and a private hot tub. After a day on the slopes, leave gear in the ski storage area and unwind with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi or cozy up to the gas fireplace. The villa is heated and has laundry facilities, but for summer visitors, air conditioning is not available.Oversized windows bring The View into the open-concept great room of this luxury property, so you can watch the light move across the slopes of the mountains while curled up in the sitting area or swapping stories with friends and family around the dining table. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the room and features a convenient breakfast bar.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with a fireplace and its own balcony. There’s also one bedroom with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, kitchenette and shared access to a hall bathroom that could be used by parents and children or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. For larger parties, there’s an office space with a queen sofa bed and shared access to a hall bathroom.No matter what time of year your holiday, you’ll find plenty to see and do in the Mountain Village area around the villa. When there’s snow on the ground, you can ski in and out to the White Otter lift; otherwise, it’s a short drive to a nearby clubhouse, golf course and the breathtaking Ousel Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With three natural reefs just off the shore from this oceanfront property, Three Cays Villa is a snorkeler’s paradise. Located on Turtle Tail on Providenciales, the four-bedroom villa has ocean access for guests who’ve brought their masks and flippers, plus a swimming pool and spacious terrace for those who’d rather stay on land. With a guest cottage, this Mediterranean-style home offers an unforgettable experience inside and out.Step through the villa’s gates into lush, landscaped gardens and continue to the 150 feet of ocean frontage. Enjoy sea views from the private pool, surrounding patio, or al-fresco dining area, complete with outdoor grill. There’s also a shaded outdoor dining area and covered sitting area if you need shelter from the tropical sun. In the evenings, satellite television, Wi-Fi access and air conditioning provide entertainment and comfort.There’s room for everyone to relax in Three Cays Villa’s large, open living room. A cathedral ceiling topped with a fan keeps things cool and breezy, plenty of wicker seating is casual and inviting and sand-colored cushions are a reminder you’re at the beach. Gather around the long table in the dining room for family meals with a picture-window view of the sea, or around the spacious breakfast bar in the gourmet kitchen for a look at the ocean with your morning coffee.There are three bedrooms in the main house, and one in the poolside guest cottage. All four bedrooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans. In the main house, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with jetted tub and a television. There’s also one bedroom with two twin beds and one bedroom with a queen bed that share a bathroom. The guest cottage has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom flat-screen television and a mini fridge.You can swim and snorkel right from Three Cays Villa, but if you want to walk in the sand, the famed stretches of Grace Bay Beach are just a 15-minute drive away. It’s a 10-minute drive to the grocery store, and 15 minutes by car to restaurants, a tennis court, a gym and a clinic. The airport is a 20-minute drive away, and the golf course and downtown area are both a 25-minute drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find innovative design alongside classic Amalfi Coast scenery at Villa Galidia. This seaside vacation rental is filled with clever architecture and inspiring artwork. What’s more, its perch high above the water is only a few minutes’ walk from shopping, dining and more in the town of Sorrento. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property for a laid-back holiday with friends or a trip spent exploring the area with family.Your stay at Villa Galidia includes daily housekeeping and continental breakfast. When you’ve finished sipping your morning coffee at the al-fresco dining table, shift to a lounger in the sun or stretch out in the indoor exercise room. In the evenings, stay outside around the barbecue and hot tub, or relax inside with the help of the smart TV and Wi-Fi.The villa’s bright, beautiful rooms are a thoughtful pairing of the traditional and modern. Refined sofas sit under high ceilings and geometric wallpaper in the living room, while a contemporary staircase floats above the table in the dining room. The inviting kitchen is fully equipped and has a breakfast area.Villa Galidia has one bedroom with a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom. There is one other bedroom with a king bed, and two bedrooms with queen beds. These three bedrooms have shared access to a hall bathroom, but direct access to a terrace or balcony.If you can tear yourself away from the villa’s spectacular views over the Mediterranean Sea, it’s less than a 10-minute walk to the town center of Sorrento, where you can browse local boutiques or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a waterfront eatery. The villa is also a short drive from the town of Positano and its beach, as well as the must-see ruins of Pompeii.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’re looking to immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, beautiful architecture, and ancient history of Florence, look no further. This downtown apartment is located right in the heart of Florence’s historical center, with its balcony overlooking one of the city’s major piazzas. Recently renovated, Capital features a delightful mix of luxurious modern amenities, and authentic Old-World design, with many of its ancient features still intact. Just step outside your front door, and you’ll be on the winding stone streets of Florence, with many of the city’s most famous monuments minutes away.From the parquet floors to the fresco ceilings, Capital is designed with authentic elegance, grace, and the Old World ambiance of Florence. No expense was spared when decorating Capital’s dining areas, living room, state of the art kitchen, and four en-suite bedrooms. Throughout the villa, you’ll find the finest designer furniture, high-end electronics, and lavish fixtures. And, you’ll love people watching from the balcony’s exciting city view.Capital’s fully equipped kitchen comes with a dishwasher, ice maker, and a Nespresso machine, as well as everything else you’ll need to prepare amazing meals. The formal dining area seats twelve, and there’s a small alfresco set on the balcony that is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee. The villa is also outfitted with Wi-Fi, television, and a stereo system. And, it comes with daily housekeeping during your stay.From Capital’s convenient location, you’ll have no trouble finding your way to attractions like Ponte Vecchio, Piazza del Duomo, and Riccardi Medici Palace. At the Galleria dell Accademia you can visit Michelangelo’s masterpiece sculpture, David. If you’re in the mood for fine Italian cuisine, the Michelin-starred Borgo San Jacopo, located along the Arno River, is one of the country’s finest restaurants. And, if you’d like to see where the locals spend their nights out, cross the river to Piazza Santo Spirito, which is home to a proper Tuscan street market, and plenty of bars, restaurants, and cafes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay between beach and town in Tulum at the beautifully designed Casa Lulu. This Riviera Maya vacation rental is tucked away in the exclusive Aldea Zama residential neighborhood, a quiet enclave just a short drive from shopping and dining in town and the idyllic stretch of the beach. Reserve its four bedrooms for a getaway with up to eight friends or a relaxed holiday with the extended family.The casa is nestled into a private courtyard with a sunny terrace featuring a pool, loungers and a barbecue. Spend days lazing by the pool or exploring the area, then come inside at night for a glass from the wine fridge and a quiet evening in front of the TV or Wi-Fi. For your comfort, the house has both ceiling fans and air conditioning.Inside, Casa Lulu embodies laid-back luxury. A slide-away glass wall separates the terrace from the open-concept great room, where you can stretch out on the sofa in front of the TV, gather around the dining table or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. Colorful accents, wicker furniture and a stunning waterfall countertop add to the vibe of chilled-out cool.The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared hall bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a Jack-and-Jill-style bathroom that’s accessible from both rooms.More than just a beach destination, Tulum is also a hot spot of culture and history. (Of course, Casa Lulu is also just a short drive from a postcard-perfect beach, too.) Head into town to browse artisan wares, sip drinks at a bar or cafe, or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy meal. Don’t miss the chance to visit the area’s incredible oceanfront ruins for a glimpse into Mayan history.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You don’t often think of a “downtown” atmosphere when you’re booking a ski vacation, but in Breckenridge, Colorado, the two contrasting environments exist in perfect harmony. With walking access to the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Main Street and BreckConnect Gondola, you’ll be in the prime location for a day on the slopes and a night on the town. With three bedrooms and accommodations for twelve, Slope View Chalet is perfect for an extended family, or a group of friends on vacation together.The classic ski chalet gets a modern-contemporary update at this stylish vacation rental. It’s still got the raw stone, exposed wood, and warm leather furniture of yesteryear, but with a sleek, minimalistic twist. A vaulted ceiling and two-storey window provides a spacious feel in the open concept living area. Form meets function in the stone fireplace that stretches the entire height of the living room, not only is it beautiful, but it houses both the gas fire and a flat screen television. Flowing onward to the kitchen, you’ll find granite countertops and high-end stainless steel appliances.When dinner’s ready, the formal dining space has an artistic “picnic” style seating arrangement for eight. There’s also space for three more at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, and a barbecue outside on the balcony. Whether you’re feeling like spending more time outside in the hot tub or by the fire pit, or you’d prefer the warmth within, Slope View’s got everything you’ll need to make the most of your exciting ski vacation.If you’re traveling with kids, Carter Park is under a mile from the chalet and it’s perfect for family fun. Spend an afternoon sledding and snow tubing in a picturesque environment, sure to excite the kids and the young at heart. Breckenridge Golf Club is another great way to enjoy the rugged mountain terrain while challenging yourself to a round on their championship eighteen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Impeccable Brushstrokes is part of the magical Belizean Cove Estates, an exquisite beachfront oasis of tranquility with spectacular views of the Ambergris Caye and the remarkable Caribbean Sea.Brushstrokes villa is named to reflect the owners' love and appreciation for the art and people of Belize. Once inside this splendid villa you’ll be delighted by its light and airy cream décor that acts as the perfect backdrop to the many paintings and sculptures by local Belizean artists. Furnished tastefully with a mix of comfortable imported and locally designed furniture it also features fabulous Belizean Mahogany and other indigenous hardwoods that make you feel enveloped by local culture. Your immaculate kitchen is spacious and well equipped and has an adjoining dining area that easily accommodates up to eight people. Your relaxed living room features an entertainment system with a 42 inch high definition telephone and a surround sound system; all the comforts of home with the Caribbean just steps away.Outside your luxurious marble-decked veranda is the perfect place for you to savor a spectacular beachfront sunrise while you have breakfast of fresh local produce. Afterwards you might want to take a dip in the delightful shared pool or unwind in the hot tub. Why not head down to the beach later and take out a sea kayak? It’s going to be another superb day and this is the ideal way to explore the Caye.Your three bedroom villa features luxurious and uniquely decorated private guest bedrooms. The master bedroom, with king bed and lavish bathroom with shower and whirlpool tub, has another magnificent ocean view. The second bedroom, with queen bed, is decorated in whimsical island colors and a lovely third bedroom, with two twin beds, features a Mayan theme in its décor. Each bedroom has a door to the outside, copious windows and a full bathroom in luxurious Mexican Macedonia marble.San Pedro Town, the only town on the island, is just 3 miles away you are one mile from tennis and basketball courts. Belize’s famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25 mile length of the island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched above the fourth green of Jack Nicklaus’ Beaver Course at Breckenridge Golf Club, Speyside Fairway offers its guests scenic mountain views, spacious common areas, and a stylish atmosphere that will elevate your next Luxury Retreats Ski Vacation. Located three minutes from the course, and ten minutes from Main Street and the BrekConnect Gondola, Speyside maintains a high level of privacy without sacrificing its proximity to Breckenridge’s most exciting attractions.WIth four luxurious bedrooms, an open concept great room, and plenty of comfortable seating for the whole group, Speyside is perfect for family vacations or getaways with friends. The traditional vibe of a ski lodge isn’t lost on this trendy villa, its embraced and updated to meet the high standards of the most discerning modern luxury travelers. Only the finest electronics, appliances, fixtures, and finishes have gone into Speyside, and whether you’re planning a social night with friends or a quiet movie night with the family, you’re sure to appreciate the villa’s impressive ambiance.Speyside Fairway is outfitted with a state of the art kitchen that features restaurant caliber appliances, gorgeous granite countertops, and a breakfast bar that invites a social atmosphere, even when preparing meals. After dinner, gather around the fireplace or post up at the wet bar to recount tales of an exciting day on the mountain. Outside, fire pit and hot tub are great places to relax, warm up, and enjoy the view.Downtown Breckenridge is a hotspot for exciting mountain nightlife, with a wide range of restaurants, bars, live music venues, and nightclubs, all year-round. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, you’ll find World-class golf, hiking, mountain biking, and rock climbing in Summit County. In the winter, it’s all about skiing. WIthin thirty-kilometers, you’ll be able to visit the slopes of Breckenridge Ski Resort, Copper Mountain, Keystone, and Vail.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated on Lake Wakatipu’s North-East hillside, The Views has a perfect vantage point of the calm lake and The Remarkables Mountain range. Whether you’re in town for golf, skiing, or just to enjoy the unique atmosphere, Queenstown is a beautiful city with plenty to offer. The Views is a three-bedroom luxury rental with a great location and easy access to Queenstown’s many nearby attractions.Nearly every bit of The Views mountain-facing walls are constructed with floor-to-ceiling glass, easily framing the picturesque mountain views. The open-concept interior is decorated with plush designer furniture, stainless steel appliances, and rugged stone accent walls. The ambiance is modern and slightly minimalistic, making it easy to appreciate the thoughtfully chosen decor and dynamic natural environment.Upon arrival, you’ll have garage parking and extra space in the driveway. You may notice the hot tub, barbecue, and alfresco dining area on your way inside. Once inside, The Views is equipped with Wi-Fi, Sky TV, and iPod docking station. The kitchen features an espresso machine, dishwasher, and a breakfast bar. There’s a formal dining area with space for eight. After dinner, curl up in the media room for a movie or lounge by the fireplace. When it’s time for bed, the luxuriously outfitted master boasts a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a private balcony. The other two-bedrooms feature either a king or queen sized bed, share a hall bathroom and have direct access to the private balcony. And, all three-bedrooms have soaring mountain views.Look across the Lake to the West, and you’ll see the Queenstown Golf Course, featuring eighteen-holes, on what is regarded to be one of the most scenic courses on the planet. If you’re looking for alpine excitement, Coronet Peak, and The Remarkables ski areas are both within thirty-kilometers. And, just eight-minutes up the lake shore, you’ll find Queenstown’s downtown area, where shops, restaurants, nightlife, and the Skyline Casino await.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
